snippet.title: Dev Archives: Game Overview | Crimson Desert
snippet.description:
What can be found in the world of Crimson Desert? How will the action feel? Who is Macduff? The lead devs answer these questions and more as they give an overview of Crimson Desert's world, story, game content, and action direction in this Dev Archives video.

The lead devs featured in the video:
Daeil Kim: Executive Producer
HwanKyoung Jung: Producer
SeongWoo Lee: Producer
Hyoseok Chae: Lead Combat Designer

About Crimson Desert
Crimson Desert is an open-world action-adventure game developed by Pearl Abyss, aiming for a global release on console and PC platforms. Through vibrant storytelling and intense action, Crimson Desert depicts realistic characters and narratives that revolve around the members of the Greymane Free Company fighting to achieve their noble mission.
Experience the beautiful yet brutal continent of Pywel, where you will witness the conflicts and epic sagas surrounding Kliff, the leader of the Greymanes, as his mission takes him on an unforgettable journey.

Hear it first on Crimson Desert's official channels and make sure to subscribe to the newsletter through the site:
» Official Site: https://crimsondesert.pearlabyss.com
» Discord: https://discord.gg/crimsondesert
» Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/crimsondesert_
» Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/crimsondesert_
» Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/crimsondesert

#CrimsonDesert #DevArchives #Commentary

About Pearl Abyss 
Best known for the Black Desert franchise, Pearl Abyss is a leading developer in the game industry. Established in 2010, Pearl Abyss has since developed Black Desert for PC, mobile, and console. The company is currently developing Crimson Desert, DokeV, and PLAN 8 on a next-gen proprietary engine. More information about Pearl Abyss is available at: https://www.pearlabyss.com
